pages.text: Wooden Bolts are the classic ammunition for the Witch Hunter $(l:artifacts/weapons/crossbow_pistol)Crossbow Pistol$(/l). It can penetrate the protection of the $(l:artifacts/clothing/belts#bark_betl)Bark Belt$(/l) and $(l:creatures/baba_yaga)Baba Yaga$(/l)'s thorns.
Upon firing Splitting Bolts they will split in three $(item)Wooden Bolts$(), each dealing half as much damage as a classic Wooden Bolt.
Bone Bolts will deal more damage to $(item)Undead$(), $(l:creatures/demon)Demons$(/l) and other $(item)Demonic creatures$().
Silver Bolts are particularly effective against $(l:creatures/werewolf)Werewolves$(/l), as they deal double damage to them and their natural resistance is ineffective against this ammunition.

This type of ammunition is particularly liked by Witch Hunters. These Bolts act just like their Wooden counterpars, except when a full set of $(l:artifacts/clothing/witch_hunter_clothing)Witch Hunter Armor$(/l) is worn.

In such case, the bolts will drain 1/3 of target's $(l:kettle/infusion_intro#power)Magical Power$(/l) and any of their $(l:artifacts/poppets/poppets#death)Poppet$(/l)-based protection is ignored. All $(item)Potion Effects$() are also removed from the target, except $(item)Poison$() and $(item)Wither$().$(p)Lastly, firing such a Bolt will also completely drain the shooter's Magical Power, if they have any.
